movies.title: Flodder in Amerika!
movies.plot: The mayor of Zonnedael sees a chance to get rid of the Flodder family: They send the asocial bunch for an international exchange to New York. There they get confused with a Russian delegation of medical doctors while the street worker Werner who accompanies them becomes imprisoned.
movies.simplePlot: The mayor of Zonnedael sees a chance to get rid of the Flodder family: They send the asocial bunch for an international exchange to New York. There they get confused with a Russian ...

biography.bio: Huub Stapel was born on December 2, 1954 in Tegelen, Limburg, Netherlands as Hubertus Wijnandus Jozef Marie Stapel. He is an actor, known for Paradis express (1997), Amsterdamned (1988) and The Lift (1983). He has been married to Resie Jansen since December 2, 2004. They have two children.
biography.name: Huub Stapel

biography.bio: Nelly Frijda was born on May 4, 1936 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Nelly Wiegel. She is an actress, known for Flodder (1993), Les gravos (1986) and Flodder 3 (1995).
biography.name: Nelly Frijda

biography.bio: René van 't Hof was born on October 15, 1956. He is an actor, known for Matterhorn (2013), Les gravos (1986) and Plan C (2012).
biography.name: René van 't Hof

biography.bio: Tatjana Simic was born on June 9, 1963 in Zagreb, Yugoslavia [now in Croatia]. She is an actress, known for Flodder (1993), Les gravos (1986) and Flodder in Amerika! (1992).
biography.name: Tatjana Simic

biography.bio: A veteran of nearly 100 films, Jon Polito is most recognized for his work with The Coen brothers, as well as his many television appearances as a series regular and guest star. Notable motion picture roles include: Millers Crossing, Barton Fink, The Man Who Wasn't There, The Crow, Blankman, and The Freshman with Marlon Brando, and Big Eyes. Directors he has worked with include; Russel Mulcahy, Clint Eastwood, John McNaughton, Tom Hanks, Andrew Bergman, Michael Apted, Ridley Scott, and Tim Burton amongst others. On television, he starred as a series regular on Crime Story, Ohara, Hearts are Wild, The Chronical, and the critically acclaimed Homicide, Life on the Street. Notable guest star roles include the befuddled landlord Sylvio on Seinfeld, his only role as a woman - Rhonda, on The Chris Isaak Show, Danny Devito's brother Frank on It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia,, and Earl Chambers on Modern Family. He starred on Broadway with Faye Dunaway in The Curse Of An Aching Heart, and with Dustin Hoffman in the 1985 Tony award winning revival of Death Of A Salesman, which he also filmed for CBS. He received the Best Actor OBIE award for Off Broadway theatre in 1980. Other awards include the 2001 TELLY for animation voice over in The Dancing Pumpkin which was directed by his brother Jack Polito, The New York Independent Festival Award for Excellence in Acting, and the 2005 Cinequest Maverick Award for his lifetime body of work in Film and Television. In 2012 Jon received the Best Actor Award for the short film Anti-Muse from the Hollywood Reel Independent Film Festival. He credits his success to three people; his mentor Dominic Garvey, his only acting teacher Irene Baird, and to the late, great director, and friend, Paul Bettis. In addition, his inspiration to this day is New York theatre artist, Theodora Skipitares, who taught him film and design in university, and who has since never been far away from his life. She is 'Art' surviving.
biography.name: Jon Polito

biography.bio: Lou Landré was born on November 20, 1939 in the Netherlands as Guillaume Louis Frédéric Landré. He is an actor, known for Flodder (1993), Karakter (1997) and Leak 2000 (2000).
biography.name: Lou Landré

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Lonny Price was born on March 9, 1959 in New York City, New York, USA. He is a director and actor, known for Dirty Dancing (1987), Lady Day at Emerson's Bar & Grill (2016) and Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street in Concert (2001).
biography.name: Lonny Price

biography.bio: Roger Robinson was born on May 2, 1940 in Seattle, Washington, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Smoking/Non-Smoking (2011), Brother to Brother (2004) and H. (2014).
biography.name: Roger Robinson

biography.bio: Mandy Negerman is an actress, known for Flodder in Amerika! (1992) and Flodder (1993).
biography.name: Mandy Negerman

biography.bio: Melle de Boer was born on August 7, 1978 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Melle Anton de Boer. He is an actor, known for Flodder in Amerika! (1992) and Flodder (1993).
biography.name: Melle de Boer

biography.placeOfBirth: Hell's Kitchen [now Clinton], Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Son of a bricklayer and ironworker, who was involved in the construction of the Empire State Building, Dan Frazer first acted in local theatre in his rough 'Hell's Kitchen' neighbourhood on the Manhattan West Side. He also benefited from the Federal Theatre Project, funded by the Works Progress Administration after the onset of the Great Depression. During World War II, Dan helped entertain troops as a member of the U.S. Army Special Services, subsequently making his first appearance on Broadway as a marine in 'Christopher Blake'. He began acting on the small screen during the 1950's, appearing in anything from anthology series, to comedies, to crime drama. His motion picture debut did not eventuate until 1963, when he portrayed a priest in Lilies of the Field (1963). For the best part of his screen career, Dan portrayed an assortment of clergymen and cops, almost invariably honest, hard-working types. Internationally, he became best known as Telly Savalas's nervous NYPD boss, Captain Frank McNeil, during all five seasons of Kojak (1973); and as Virgil Starkwell's (Woody Allen's) psychiatrist in the hilarious Take the Money and Run (1969). Dan Frazer was a Member of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
biography.name: Dan Frazer

biography.bio: Reathel Bean was born on August 24, 1942 in Missouri, USA. He is an actor, known for Dancer in the Dark (2000), Almost Famous (2000) and The Nanny Diaries (2007).
biography.name: Reathel Bean

biography.bio: Immigrated to the United States in 1952. Lived in a trailer -- traveling throughout the country with his family before settling in Kansas City, then suburban Chicago. Educated at Northern Illinois University. Began his professional career in Chicago, where he helped found The Theatre Building, then moved to New York in 1978. Now lives in London and Chicago.
biography.name: Colin Stinton

biography.bio: Deirdre Harrison is an actress, known for A Midsummer Night's Dream (1999), My House in Umbria (2003) and Shining Through (1992).
biography.name: Deirdre Harrison

biography.bio: Amanda Redington was born in January 1962 in England. She is an actress, known for Flodder in Amerika! (1992), The Best Thing in Life (1993) and Heaven and Earth with Gloria Hunniford (1998).
biography.name: Amanda Redington
